tha-ap42:4.3: lagetvā → laggetvā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | laṅghitvā (si) | laṅghetvā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap42:6.2: mama vassitā → mama nissitā (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | samavassikā (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap42:14.6: gāthā dvayadasasataṃ → gāthāyo dvādasasatanti (bj) | gāthādvayaṃ dasasataṃpica (sya1ed, sya2ed) | gāthā dvādasa sataṃti (pts-vp-pli1ed)
